passes.help: Heading levels should only increase by one

ancestry: html > body > div:nth-child(3) > div:nth-child(1) > div > h1:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(3) > div:nth-child(1) > div > h2:nth-child(2)
html > body > div:nth-child(3) > div:nth-child(1) > div > h3:nth-child(10)
html > body > div:nth-child(3) > div:nth-child(1) > div > h4:nth-child(11)
html > body > div:nth-child(3) > div:nth-child(1) > div > h4:nth-child(13)
